chunk:
Epicuren Discovery BIO PEPTIDE COMPLEX SERUM

Brand: Epicuren

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Pullulan, Sodium Polystyrene Sulfonate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Acetyl Octapeptide-3, Dipeptide Diaminobutyroyl Benzylamide Diacetate, Sorghum Bicolor Stalk Juice, Algae Extract, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
Directions: After toner application, apply a dime size amount over entire face, neck, and décolleté. Follow with moisturizer.

Warnings: Some of Epicuren®'s products are manufactured in a facility that uses gluten, non-vegan ingredients, iodine, nuts, kernels, and nut-derived products. Because of this, it is possible that cross- contamination can occur.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
